data.Title: Google Confirms AI Overviews Affected By Core Updates
data.Description: Google's John Mueller confirms core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update
data.Description: Google released its August 2024 core update on Thursday, August 15th, followed shortly after by a large search ranking bug. SEOs and site owners are asking how we can differentiate between the two.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google and Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Wikipedia-style service Baidu Baike recently barred the search engine crawlers of Google and Bing from indexing its online content.

data.Title: Perplexity's AI Search to Feature Ads
data.Description: AI search engine Perplexity told advertisers it plans to start running ads in Q4; a source says Perplexity's CPM prices will be $50+ "Advertisers will be able to sponsor “related…

data.Title: Bing Image Creator Adds New Resize Feature
data.Description: Bing Image Creator now allows users to resize images from square to landscape.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Gets Refinement Cards
data.Description: Microsoft now has these refinement cards or boxes directly in the Bing Image Search results interface. In these cards, Bing will show you a refinement option for your query with example photos you might find for that refined search query.

data.Title: Reddit's Advertising Strategy Targets Subreddits
data.Description: Reddit is winning over advertisers with interest-based targeting via subreddits, instead of personal data; Analysis: Reddit's ad revenue to reach $1.1B+ in 2024.

data.Title: YouTube is the Most Popular Podcast Listening Platform in the US
data.Description: A Cumulus Media Study of 603 weekly podcast consumers found that YouTube was the most popular podcast listening platform in the US with 31% of respondents saying they use it, followed by Spotify at 21% and Apple at 12%.

data.Title: Google to Migrate All Merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September
data.Description: Google will be migrating all merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September.

data.Title: Hardbacon.ca Impacted by Google Updates and Bankruptcy
data.Description: Hardbacon.ca experienced significant traffic fluctuations due to Google's September helpful content update, bankruptcy filing, and the August core update.

data.Title: Having Many Noindexed Pages Is Not a Sign of Low Quality
data.Description: Google's John Mueller and other SEO experts clarify that having a large number of noindexed pages does not necessarily indicate low website quality.
